Campus Safety
Greek Life

Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Bang for the buck
What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
The campus police on campus are always monitoring campus 24/7. Whenever an incident happens; all students are notified ASAP via email. It is very convenient.

This school has TONS of sororities and fraternities. Basically, anyone interested in being in one can find one that suits them; no matter what. Our greek life on campus is a huge part of Fresno State and is definitely something Fresno State is known for.
Fresno State has tons of clubs; There is a place for everyone at this school.
-Academically motivated -Athletes -Social people -Musicians
Vintage Days. Vintage Days happens once a year at Fresno State and it's like this huge carnival style thing open to the community. It's amazing and is definitely a great time for everyone in Fresno.
We have one of the nicest libraries in California, filled with amazing sources for research and more. There also is a huge music library with tons of recordings, dvds, and cds open to anyone's use.

Go to the football games! Or go to the student union where they have bowling, billiards, and video games. There is always something to do around campus which is convenient for students with breaks between classes.
Fresno State has a great student union which has restaurants such as Subway, Panda Express, Taco Bell, Chick-Fil-A, and more.
The dorms at Fresno State are not the nicest which is why I choose to live at home.

Academically, Fresno State isn't the biggest challenge, however; it is mainly because the professors there are always so willing to help their students. Teachers are very understanding and students are always given opportunities to get help.

If attending Fresno State, always make sure you know when your deadlines are; especially those for financial aid and registration for classes. Stay on top of things and don't slack off, it will come to bite you in the end. The sooner the better definitely applies to the CSU system.
Fresno State is a campus filled with diversity, distinction, and honor. The professors are extremely generous and helpful. It truly is a great place for education.

The textbooks are informative and can usually be rented at an affordable price in the library. Overall, CSU Fresno offers a great learning environment. textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Ashley from Fresno, CA 03/21/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 12 out of 12 people found this review useful. 3 of 134 Categories Comments Campus Safety Fresno is naturally a dangerous place, but the on campus police are very effective at patrolling. There are also spots about campus with emergency buttons that will immediately call the police. These precautions make the students feel better about walking at night. Greek Life Greek life is a big part of Fresno. There are something like 26 sororities on campus, and they are your best bet for a social group with similar interests. Clubs and Activities Between the array of clubs and the students who are excited about them, there is always something to dedicate your time to. Great for these types of students students pursuing agricultural carreers should definately consider Fresno State as a top choice. The school is excellent
